name: Otome Legends (FULL GAME)
description:
GAME DESC

Your friend recommends you to play a dating sim that she's been obsessed with lately. After playing it, you reflect on your life and realize that you wish you could live your life as the main heroine of a dating sim. The next day when you tell your friend at school about the game, she comes up with a mischievous plan to turn you into a real life otome heroine and things go terribly wrong. 

Description of game play

A visual novel where the routes are not routes, the endings are not endings, and your choices are not real choices.
You don't have a choice.

Each route takes 1.5-2 hours to complete.  There are 4 routes (plus secret route) making it 5 in total.

TRIGGER WARNING This game contains themes of suicide and depression, graphic imagery of blood and gore, and themes of violence. Please play at your own risk.
